name: Holiday Historic Inn Tours
short_description: Enjoy an enchanted evening of five decorated inns and a sampling of holiday treats and cheer at each property. From 6-8 p.m., tours are self guided
long_description: Enjoy an enchanted evening of five decorated inns and a sampling of holiday treats and cheer at each property. From 6-8 p.m., tours are self guided. Free trolley transportation is provided between inns but participants are welcome to bike or use their own transportation. Call the Lodging Association for tickets.
